1.5.3.en: Fixed bug with average fuel consumption missing in engine stopped trigger

1.5.1.en: Fixed bug with device not being available after repair

1.5.0.en: Fixed bug with location change trigger

1.4.9.en: Fixed bug with engine start command

1.4.8.en: Authentication refactored to use Volvo's official OAuth2 API

1.4.7.en: Added support for window open conditions

1.4.6.en: Removed the Volvo On Call device type. Volvo has closed down the inofficial API and the device is no longer functional. Added support for Homey Energy for electric cars.

1.4.3.en: Deprecated the Volvo On Call device type. Volvo has closed down the inofficial API and the device is no longer functional.

1.3.7.en: Solved the unauthorized_client problem for the Connected Vehicle device type

1.3.5.en: Latitude and Longtitude included in location changed trigger (thanks to jvdweerthof)

1.3.2.en: New Connected Vehicle device type that supports Android auto based cars

1.2.4.en: Converted the custom locked capability to the native locked capability

1.2.3.en: Fixed bug related to average fuel consumption missing

1.2.2.en: Fixed bug with API calls which require position

1.1.4.en: Fixed bug with duplicate charge cable triggers

1.1.3.en: VOC position API response stored in debug setting

1.1.2.en: Average fuel consumption added to engine stop trigger

1.1.1.en: Fixed bug related to status refresh
